catalogue_raissonne: Rovinski 1894 77.79.II; Le Bl.1; D.3; Hollstein 11 iii/iii; Du. 3; Bartsch-Claussin 1797-1828 II.137.79
creditline:
The William M. Ladd Collection
Gift of Herschel V. Jones, 1916
inscription: Title inscribed within the plate, beneath image: \"Joannes Secundus Hagiensis / Poeta\"
markings: Collectior mark verso, in black ink: F (inside a shield) [D. Franken]
provenance: D. Franken. Robert Dumesnil. William M. Ladd, Portland, Ore., sold to Jones; Herschel V. Jones, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 1916.
signed: Signed and inscribed within the plate, at left: \"Rodermont / fecit\".
title: Joannes Secundus Hagiensis, Poeta
